profile.description: The profile to use from the config file.
profile.name: profile

zipfile.description: Overrides the source path for the zip archive.
zipfile.name: zipfile

extractpath.description: Overrides the output directory for extraction.
extractpath.name: extractpath

unzip.description:
This command reads profiles from 'civ-zip-config.jsonc' to extract a resource archive.
The source zip file and extraction path are determined by the profile, but can be overridden.
unzip.summary: Unzips Civilization VII resources based on a profile.

profile.description: The profile to use from the config file.
profile.name: profile

zipfile.description: Overrides the output path for the zip archive.
zipfile.name: zipfile

zip.description:
This command reads profiles from 'civ-zip-config.jsonc' to create a zip archive of the game's resources.
It automatically detects the operating system to find the default game resource directory but can be overridden.
The command supports include/exclude patterns and provides a summary of the operation.

verbose.description: Enables verbose output from the zip command.
verbose.name: verbose

zip.summary: Zips Civilization VII resources based on a profile.
